text: Kahuti is a settlement in Kenya's Central Province. It is located at the junction between the newly reconstructed C72 road and the Kahuti Githiga B road. Kahuti is also the home of the late statesman and politician Dr. Julius Gikonyo Kiano who was born in the nearby village of Githiga. == References == Category:Populated places in Central Province (Kenya)
title: Kahuti, Kenya
